score module

score.fetch_arguments()

This method handles the command line arguments entered by the user. It uses argparse module to parse the arguments.

args(dict):

A dictionary of command line arguments.

score.get_predictions(models, X, y)

To score all the models that were loaded using joblib. This method prints all the metrics and the accuracy of all the models.

models (tuple): A tuple of models. X (numpy.array): Independent variables y (numpy.array): Dependent variables

score.load_test_data(path)

To load the test dataset for scoring the trained models.

path (str):

Path to the directory in which test dataset is stored.

pandas.DataFrame: loaded test dataset

score.main(args, logger)
score.read_models(path)

Reading the dumped models to score them using the test dataset.

path (str): Path to the dumped models

tuple: A tuple of all the models.
